item.title: Replicability in Learning: Geometric Partitions and KKM-Sperner Lemma
item.description: This paper reveals near-optimal relationships between geometric partitions and replicability in machine learning, establishing the optimality of existing algorithms and introducing a new neighborhood …

item.title: What is my quantum computer good for? Quantum capability learning with physics-aware neural networks
item.description: Quantum-physics-aware neural networks achieve up to 50% improved accuracy in predicting quantum computer capabilities, scaling to 100+ qubits.
